actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1089.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill H.R. 7542 making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1980, rescinding certain budget authority, and for other purposes, and amendments thereto.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 7542 (budget rescissions and supplemental appropriations).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the bill H.R. 7542 making supplemental appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1980, rescinding certain budget authority, and for other purposes, and amendments thereto.
